relate pr:https://github.com/cocos2d/bindings-generator/pull/188
add the conversion for tmxTileFlags,
because the default data type of tmxTileFlag is int, but the value beyond int type range. so we need use uint to save it.

data.title: Cocos2dx 3.6 compile failed on Ubuntu 14.04LTS 64-bit
data.body:
I set up android-sdk, ndk, ant and cocos2dx 3.6 on Ubuntu 14.04LTS 64-bit, run ./setup.py and build/install-deps-linux.sh, then create a new lua project and run, Then I got:

/frameworks/cocos2d-x/cocos/platform/desktop/CCGLViewImpl-desktop.h:62:80: error: GLFWvidmode does not name a type
.../frameworks/cocos2d-x/cocos/platform/desktop/CCGLViewImpl-desktop.h:128:30: error: GLFWwindow has not been declared
.../frameworks/cocos2d-x/cocos/platform/desktop/CCGLViewImpl-desktop.h:62:104: error: GLFWmonitor has not been declared

I searched on internet and found https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/9251, but the solution did not work for me.

ps. I ran successfully on Ubuntu 32-bit.
